Judul: GEOCHEMOMETRICS AND ITS APPLICATION TO ULTRA-TRACE DETECTION OF ORGANOHALOGENS IN SOIL
Abstrak: Abstrak:  Application of multivariate statistics in geo-chemistry, geochemometrics, to data obtained from Mass Spectral analysis of volatiles and semi-volatiles in soils is exemplified and applied to detection of ultratrace amounts of perchloro-ethylene (PCE) and tricholoroethylene (TCE).
Kata Kunci: multivariate statistics; geo-chemistry; geochemometrics; perchloro-ethylene (PCE); Tricholoroethylene (TCE).
